page.title: Kodak: Digital Imaging Growing Faster
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Photography company Eastman Kodak Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=EK.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">EK.N</A> on Wednesday raised its growth forecast on digital products and services, such as cameras and medical imaging, key areas it is depending on to offset rapidly declining sales in its traditional film business.
